content.rendered:
The Vigo Round Coffee Table is a new addition to the popular Vigo range. Available in the same range of frame colours as the stools, the Vigo Coffee table certainly stands out from the rest.

The Vigo coffee table is perfect for café’s, restaurants, bistro’s and a host of other commercial venues. Be sure to check out the full Vigo range in the related products section below.

The Vigo Coffee table is available from stock in 3 working days. 1 year warranty.
